    • Method Detail

      • addPiece

        public boolean addPiece(PlacedPiece piece)
        Adds the given piece to the board, if valid.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to add to the board.
        Returns:
        true if the piece was added to the board, false otherwise.

      • removePiece

        public boolean removePiece(PlacedPiece piece)
        Removes the given piece from the board, if possible
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to be removed
        Returns:
        true If the piece on the board and it was removed, false otherwise.

      • getPieceAtLocation

        public Piece getPieceAtLocation(int row,
                                int col)
        Gets the piece at the specified position (if there is one)
        Parameters:
        row - The row coordinate
        col - The column coordinate
        Returns:
        The piece at the given position if there is one, null otherwise

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(PlacedPiece piece)
        Test if the given piece would intersect a piece on the board
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to test intersection for
        Returns:
        true if the piece intersects another piece on the board, false otherwise.
